Module: Librum::Components::RSpec::RenderComponent

Librum::Components::RSpec
Defined In
lib/librum/components/rspec/render_component.rb

Table Of Contents

Overview

Test helper for rendering a ViewComponent instance to a String.

Back To Top

Instance Methods

#pretty_render(component) => String

Generates a normalized representating of a component or fragment.

Parameters

  • component — [ViewComponent::Base, Nokogiri::HTML::DocumentFragment, String] the component, fragment, or HTML string to normalize.

Returns

  • (String) — the normalized string representation.

#render_component(component) => String

Renders a component to a string.

Parameters

  • component (ViewComponent::Base) — the component to render.

Returns

  • (String) — the string representation of the component.

#render_document(component) => Nokogiri::HTML::DocumentFragment

Renders a component to a Nokogiri document fragment.

Parameters

  • component (ViewComponent::Base) — the component to render.

Returns

  • (Nokogiri::HTML::DocumentFragment) — the parsed document fragment.
